header.gameNote: MGM RESORTS MAIN EVENT - CAMPUS GAME

videos.description: Quinndary Weatherspoon drives into the paint and double-clutches in the air for a difficult layup underneath two defenders.
videos.headline: Weatherspoon readjusts midair for impressive layup

videos.description: Mississippi State's Tyson Carter steals the ball, then races past defenders for a wide-open jam.
videos.headline: Carter steals it, runs down court for slam

videos.description: KJ Byers gets up to block a Mississippi State shooter underneath the rim.
videos.headline: Byers stuffs Mississippi State player under rim

videos.description: Reggie Perry gets stuffed by the rim, but gets his own rebound to jam it successfully.
videos.headline: Perry rebounds own missed dunk for 2nd-chance slam

videos.description: Mississippi State's Robert Woodard stuffs a shot, then shows off his handles down-court before throwing it down.
videos.headline: Woodard blocks shot, dribbles around 2 defenders for jam
